dns.desc: When you set custom DNS servers, any DNS queries will be resolved through them (instead of the DNS servers obtained through network interface). Otherwise, you will use the DNS settings configured for each interface.
dns.rebinding_tips: Turning this option on may cause private DNS lookup failure. If your network has a captive portal please disable this option.
dns.override_label: Override DNS Settings of All Clients
dns.override_tips: If enabled, your router will override unencrypted DNS settings for all clients.
dns.v1_tips: The router uses version v1 of DNS. Not all encrypted DNS servers are supported.
dns.server_tips: You can choose up to eight servers. The router will automatically choose the fastest server among them.
dns.host_tips: Requests from clients will be resolved, initially, using the static DNS rules you have written in Hosts.
dns.adguardhome_in_use_tips: AdGuard Home is enabled and this router will use the DNS server provided by AdGuard Home as the custom DNS server. The DNS server settings will not work.
dns.server_warning_tips: The server appears to have expired.
dns.bark_enable_override_tips: Bark blocks almost all DNS requests from clients sent to the Internet. If you enable this option while Bark is working, your clients may not be able to access the Internet.
dns.override_vpn_label: Allow Custom DNS to Override VPN DNS
dns.override_vpn_tips: If this option is enabled, once you have set custom DNS, packets transmitted through the VPN tunnel will be resolved using the custom DNS override instead of the DNS server settings from the VPN connections.
dns.controld_plan_tips: There are two plans, free and premium, and you can only choose one of them.
dns.at_least_one_ipv4_tip: DNS servers require at least one IPv4 address.
dns.public_servers_refer_tips: For a list of public servers, please refer to {link}
dns.least_one_server_tips: Please add at least one server
dns.encrypted_dns_url_tips: You can directly enter url link or stamp link format of encrypted DNS:
dns.encryption_conflicting_msg: Conflicting encryption forms, please use links with the same encryption form.
dns.override_priority_tips: Priority is higher than DNS settings assigned to clients through DHCP.
